summary: Completed e2e testing of UK Veterans Support Admin Panel - all requested features working correctly

minor.issue: Returns reset token in response when Resend not configured - intended for dev mode but should be hidden in production

issues: Shield icon showing as placeholder box - font asset loading error (520 status)
Ionicons not loading - may need font preloading fix

action_items: Fix Ionicons font loading issue (520 error on font asset request)
Consider hiding reset_token from forgot-password response in production
critical_code_review_comments: Font asset loading returning 520 error - check Expo asset configuration

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all flows working, minor icon display issues)

seed_data_creation: CMS content seeded via API and Load Default Content button
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin login working via /login page. Use type() method with delay for React Native Web inputs. Click buttons using parent element click pattern. All 4 tabs (Counsellors, Peers, Users, CMS) functional. Add New modal with checkbox working.

features_tested.admin_login: PASS - Login at /login with admin@veteran.dbty.co.uk works, redirects to /admin
features_tested.admin_dashboard_tabs: PASS - Counsellors, Peers, Users, CMS tabs all visible and functional
features_tested.add_new_counsellor_modal: PASS - Modal opens, shows Name/Specialization/Phone fields
features_tested.create_login_checkbox: PASS - When checked, Email for login and Password fields appear
features_tested.cms_tab: PASS - Shows Home Page, Crisis Support sections with all content
features_tested.load_default_content: PASS - Button works, content loads successfully
features_tested.content_api: PASS - GET /api/content returns seeded CMS data
